overview: The film "Overnight Surprise" was produced by Nanjing Nanben Film and Television Media Co., Ltd. , Jiangsu Cangyue Shuyun Film and Television Culture Media Co., Ltd., and Jiangsu Mingmo Film and Television Culture Media Co., Ltd. jointly produced the film. Yin Zhixuan was the producer and Yao Ruiyuan was the director. Planning, Zhang Jinlong is the producer, Yang Yuhui and Shen Yuetong are screenwriters, and Liang Jianhua is the art director of Peking Opera. At the same time, the film invited well-known domestic director Xue Fei to serve as the director of the film. Young actors He Ruohe and Tong Yang starred, Hong Kong actor Luo Yunqi as a special guest starring, Yang Shengye , Wang Jianbing , Qin Qin , Liang Jianhua [1]  , Bian Tao [1]  and child star Liu Yueze co-starre
title: The Night Stay
